comment: 理學院一年級 、光電工程學士學位學程(能力分班)
restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選
description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**General English I (Fall 2019)**

**Mondays, 10:20-12:10 @** **綜合館****2F****交誼廳**

**Course Requirements:**

**Attendance and Participation 25%**

oPunctual attendance and active participation in class are highly expected.

\# If you miss more than 4 sessions, you may fail this class. In fact, you will have 2 points deducted for each unexcused absence from your final grade.

\# If you have to miss a class, please email me in advance, and mark it on the sign-in sheet.

\# If you are habitually late, points will be deducted, too.

**Midterm- Book Talk 25%**

oPoster

Option #1. Make an ID card which belongs to one of the characters in your selected book. The ID

should include a picture and all information found on an ID card.

Option #2. Make a map showing where the story took place.

oPresent the ID/ Map.

oA Letter to the character

\# Write a letter to one of the characters in your selected book. Please type your letter.

**World Café (About-Me Presentation) 15%**

oPresentation

\# Theme: Follow the guidelines from Presentation 1 (p. 49) and Presentation 2 (p. 87). Pick one topic as your own presentation topic.

\# Use visual aids (photos, posters, etc.). 2-3 mins.

**Activities & Assignments 25%**

o2 Study Journals on the textbook units we have covered. Each should include:

\# Outlines/ key points/ summary of the reading

\# 8 phrases and vocabulary, and their example sentence(s)

\# 1 discussion question and your group’s comments on this question

oActivity worksheets

o1 Reading Journal on _The Hunger Games_. According to what you have read, the reading journal should include:

\# Pages you have covered

\# Plot summary (of the reading you have covered)

\# 20 phrases and vocabulary, their definitions, and their example sentence(s)

\# Your reading reflections, (at least) 1 discussion question, and your responses to the question(s) you raise.  

**Lexile Reading Project Pre-Test 10% (Time: 10/7 – 11/8)**
